text: "Yes, I sometimes fail, but at least I'm willing to experiment." - Bono "There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way." - Christopher Morley "Change your thoughts and you change your world." - Norman Vincent Peale "Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless." - Mother Teresa "Goals are not only absolutely necessary to motivate us. They are essential to really keep us alive." - Robert Schuller "What you do speaks so loud that I cannot hear what you say." - Ralph Waldo Emerson "Ask not what your country can do for you - ask what you can do for your country." - John F. Kennedy "Live out of your imagination, not your history." -Stephen Covey "Leadership is based on a spiritual quality; the power to inspire, the power to inspire others to follow." - Vince Lombardi "You will not do incredible things without an incredible dream." - John Eliot "Finding is reserved for those that search." - Jim Rohn "I dream of painting and then I paint my dream." - Vincent Van Gogh "I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process." - Vincent Van Gogh "Minds are like parachutes - they only function when open." - Thomas Dewar "Whatever advice you give, be brief." - Horace "All that spirits desire, spirits attain." - Khalil Gibran "It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change." - Charles Darwin "It takes less time to do a thing right, than it does to explain why you did it wrong." - Henry Longfellow "Change is inevitable. Change is constant." - Benjamin Disraeli "You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment." - Henry David Thoreau
